sense.gloss: to beg, to pester, to plead, to coax, to hound, to importune

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑金↑↓きん↓をくれとしつこく↑親↑↓おや↓に|ねだる|。
sdata.e: They importune their parents for money.

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓サマが↑来↑↓き↓たからには、ママにミルクを|ねだる|↑時間↑↓じかん↓はねーぞ！
sdata.e: Now that I have come, you have no more time to beg for milk from your mummy!
